heading: TWINS DROWNED. HORSHAM TRAGEDY. MELBOURNE, January 2.
articleText:
TWINS DROWNED.

HORSHAM TRAGEDY.

MELBOURNE. January 2.

Robert and Richard ÉastweÚ, 2 year-old twins, were drowned in McKenzie Creek abont 10 miles from Horsham yesterday. The brothers were playing in the back yard of their home daring the afternoon and their mother missed them at 5 p.m. Their I father made an immediate search and found them in three feet of water in the creek 100 yards from their home.

He applied artificial respiration with-

out result
